## Header 1

```{r setup}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- read_csv(here::here("data/lipidomics.csv"))
```

## Basic statisticss

```{r}
descriptive_stats(data = lipidomics)
```

## Figure outputs

```{r}
ggplot(lipidomics, aes(x = value)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  facet_wrap(vars(metabolite), scales = "free")

plot_distributions(lipidomics)
```
